:list.description: For carousel data, see "Basic Usage" above
:list.description_zh: 轮播图数据，见上方"基本使用"说明

title.description: Whether to display the title text or not, you need to use the list parameter, as described above
title.description_zh: 是否显示标题文字，需要配合list参数，见上方说明

mode.description_zh: 指示器模式，见上方说明

autoplay.description: Whether or not to play automatically

interval.description_zh: 自动轮播时间间隔，单位ms

circular.description: Whether it is played in connection or not, see the instructions above
circular.description_zh: 是否衔接播放，见上方说明

duration.description: The time it takes to switch between a carousel, in ms
duration.description_zh: 切换一张轮播图所需的时间，单位ms

effect3d-previous-margin.description: In the case of effect3d = true mode, the distance between the active item and the front and back items, in rpx
effect3d-previous-margin.description_zh: effect3d = true模式的情况下，激活项与前后项之间的距离，单位rpx

img-mode.description: 图片的裁剪模式，详见image组件裁剪模式  (opens new window)
img-mode.description_zh: 图片的裁剪模式，详见image组件裁剪模式  (opens new window)

name.description: The attribute name in the list parameter read inside the component is described above
name.description_zh: 组件内部读取的list参数中的属性名，见上方说明

current.description: When initialized, the first items are displayed by default
current.description_zh: 初始化时，默认显示第几项

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when you click on the carousel
events.params: index：点击了第几张图片，从0开始

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the carousel is switched (automatically or manually)
events.description_zh: 轮播图切换时触发(自动或者手动切换)
events.params: index：切换到了第几张图片，从0开始
